videos.description: Tyrese Maxey adds to the 76ers' lead with two clutch 3-pointers in the final two minutes of the game.

videos.description: Tyrese Maxey speeds to stuff Caleb Martin's layup attempt to help seal the 76ers' win vs. the Heat.

videos.headline: Maxey's chase-down block seals 76ers' win
